==Translingual==
{{wikipedia|42 (number)}}

===Symbol===
{{head|mul|numeral symbol|previous|41|next|43}}

# The cardinal number [[forty-two]].

===Usage notes===
The number 42 is often given as a joking [[answer]] to the question of the meaning of [[life]], the [[universe]], and [[everything]], and is sometimes used as an example value in [[programming]] where a [[number]] is desired, in reference to ''[[w:Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy|The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy]]''.
